messages.messageBody:
--- Amy <barbie_runs_amok@...> wrote:

> Greetings All!
>
> Here's a Where-in-heck-is... Question:
>
> On another list, someone very kindly posted a link
> to a straw hat
> site. Beautiful hats, but not exactly what I am
> looking for. I am
> trying to make a traveling outfit for a
> samurai-class woman, and
> need a very large diameter gasa from which to hang
> the veils. There
> is a representation of this on The Costume Museum
> (Rebirth of the
> Tale of Genji) site, but I am unable to find the
> particular hat or
> instructions to make one. Can anyone offer any
> help? Perhaps my
> google-ing skills are lacking.
>
> Thanks!
>
> Saiaiko

http://www.shop-japan.co.jp/english-boku/warring5.htm

You're looking for the Tsumaore or Ichime-gasa. Here
you go.

Nate

messages.subject: Hat Question
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings All! Here s a Where-in-heck-is... Question: On another list, someone very kindly posted a link to a straw hat site.  Beautiful hats, but not exactly
messages.messageBody:
Greetings All!

Here's a Where-in-heck-is... Question:

On another list, someone very kindly posted a link to a straw hat
site. Beautiful hats, but not exactly what I am looking for. I am
trying to make a traveling outfit for a samurai-class woman, and
need a very large diameter gasa from which to hang the veils. There
is a representation of this on The Costume Museum (Rebirth of the
Tale of Genji) site, but I am unable to find the particular hat or
instructions to make one. Can anyone offer any help? Perhaps my
google-ing skills are lacking.

Thanks!

Saiaiko
